title: IndieLeap Platform: Functional Requirements Specification
description: Comprehensive functional requirements specification document detailing the core features, implementation details, and requirements for the IndieLeap music platform, including royalty management, artist tools, marketplace functionality, fan engagement, and AI integration.
author: William Roberts
preview: IndieLeap is conceived as a comprehensive digital ecosystem designed to address the multifaceted challenges faced by independent music artists in the contemporary music industry. The platform's core mission is to empower these creators by providing an integrated, transparent, and fair environment that supports the entire lifecycle of their music.
